item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Maybe it’s the “startsWith” in the command. I wouldn’t see why that would be a problem, but try changing that to “equalsIgnoreCase”. And check if you already have a ::bank command in your server. I’m just giving suggestions I’m not saying that’s right.

item.title: Working banking command

item.description:

	{
		openUpBank();
	}
